price: 37. Hadduu idin weydiiyo (maalkiinna dhammaan) idinkuna adkeeyo waad bakhayli laheydeen lexejecli darteed, wuxuuna debedda u soo saari lahaa xiqdigiinna (colnimadiinna).
arabic: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: in yasalkumūhā fayuḥ'fikum tabkhalū wayukh'rij aḍghānakum
translations: He were to ask you for it
